price: ߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߕߍ߮ ߝߣߊ߫ ߟߊߓߐ߫ ߸ ߞߵߊ߬ ߕߘߍ߬ ߏ ( ߕߎ߬ߓߊ߬ ) ߜߍߣߍ߲߫ ߝߟߍߟߌߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߢߊߞߘߐ߫
arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍāu lilnnāẓirīna
